Title: CSRF vulnerability in savetreenodes
Description: `savetreenode` action does not have sufficient CSRF protection, meaning that in some cases users with CMS access can be tricked into posting unspecified data into the CMS from external websites.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.3.0-alpha before 3.3.2-rc1, all versions starting from 3.2.0-alpha before 3.2.4-rc1, all versions before 3.1.19-rc1
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.3.0-alpha, all versions starting from 3.3.2-rc1, all versions before 3.2.0-alpha, all versions starting from 3.1.19-rc1 before 3.2.4-rc1
